bug.author: yanniszark
bug.summary: kfctl: Makefile vet, fmt targets don't cover the whole codebase
bug.description:
The vet and fmt targets in the kfctl Makefile don't cover the whole codebase.
kubeflow/bootstrap/Makefile
Lines 60 to 65 in aeac431
fmt:
@${GO} fmt ./config ./pkg/apis/... ./pkg/utils/... ./pkg/kfapp/minikube ./pkg/kfapp/gcp/... ./cmd/kfctl/...
# Run go vet against code
vet:
@${GO} vet ./config ./pkg/apis/... ./pkg/utils/... ./pkg/kfapp/minikube ./pkg/kfapp/gcp/... ./cmd/kfctl/...
This causes issues like <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/pull/3365>#3365</denchmark-link> to not be caught in the unit tests. Steps to fix:
Fix fmt, vet Makefile targets
